{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3423077,"name":"Justin Spurlock","username":"Snake51","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/s/90ced4/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-09-12T17:37:10.300Z","cooked":"

Hello this morning a student dropped a battery about 5-6 feat and it cracked a bit on one of the top corners

in the attached image im not sure which corner is cracked but its one of the labeled ones on the back side

Screenshot 2024-09-12 1336333601√ó604 213 KB

If the battery is cracked, it‚Äôs e-waste.

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2024-09-12T17:41:56.916Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":487,"readers_count":486,"score":337.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":471131,"topic_slug":"is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use","display_username":"Leo","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":16}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":53083,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"3128 Alumni"},"post_url":"/t/is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use/471131/2","custom_user_title":"3128 Alumni","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":14},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":16,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":true,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3423083,"name":"Max Morehead","username":"Max_Morehead","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/max_morehead/{size}/231937_2.png","created_at":"2024-09-12T17:48:34.505Z","cooked":"

Nope. Recycle with all haste, and be careful if it‚Äôs leaking. If it does leak, cool running water for at least 20 minutes if it‚Äôs on a person, or baking soda and water if it‚Äôs on the ground.

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2024-09-12T17:48:34.505Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":473,"readers_count":472,"score":109.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":471131,"topic_slug":"is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use","display_username":"Max Morehead","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":53784,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use/471131/3","custom_user_title":"Mentor","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3423084,"name":"","username":"FinIce","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/finice/{size}/270519_2.png","created_at":"2024-09-12T17:50:29.699Z","cooked":"

Baking soda, bag and box that battery, then get it recycled.

As others have said, that battery is done for.

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2024-09-12T17:50:29.699Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":467,"readers_count":466,"score":93.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":471131,"topic_slug":"is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":52870,"hidden":false,"trust_level":3,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Amateur Historian?"},"post_url":"/t/is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use/471131/4","custom_user_title":"Amateur Historian?","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3423118,"name":"ChuckDickerson","username":"ChuckDickerson","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/e79b87/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-09-12T19:15:03.354Z","cooked":"

And please let your student know its OK and things like this happen. Batteries are replaceable. Use this as an opportunity to instill a message to the team to be careful handling batteries but if you drop one its not the end of the world and its best to make sure everyone knows so it can be pulled out of service and recycled and replaced rather than the team not knowing about it and someone sticks it in a robot or something and it leaks and causes damage.

","post_number":5,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2024-09-12T19:15:03.354Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":405,"readers_count":404,"score":471.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":471131,"topic_slug":"is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use","display_username":"ChuckDickerson","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":26}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":3436,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"FRC Global Lead Robot Inspector"},"post_url":"/t/is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use/471131/5","custom_user_title":"FRC Global Lead Robot Inspector","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":24},{"id":"100","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":26,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3423125,"name":"Justin Spurlock","username":"Snake51","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/s/90ced4/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-09-12T19:20:56.522Z","cooked":"

Thank you for the input!

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2024-09-12T19:20:56.522Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":364,"readers_count":363,"score":77.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":471131,"topic_slug":"is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use","display_username":"Justin Spurlock","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":57508,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Snake51"},"post_url":"/t/is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use/471131/6","custom_user_title":"Snake51","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3423149,"name":"Jerry Krist - Lead Mentor FRC Team 1792","username":"Emcee_Krizzle","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/emcee_krizzle/{size}/176234_2.png","created_at":"2024-09-12T20:14:47.676Z","cooked":"

@Snake51 You might want to use this battery incident as a reason to have your team do a Root Cause Analysis with ‚Äú5 Whys‚Äù. You can find examples online. It will show the team the this is a serious issue, but you‚Äôre more interested in preventing future occurrences then assigning blame. It is about coming up with strategies for prevention rather than rules. Good Luck.

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2024-09-12T20:15:06.720Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":6,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":337,"readers_count":336,"score":102.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":471131,"topic_slug":"is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use","display_username":"Jerry Krist - Lead Mentor FRC Team 1792","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":57508,"username":"Snake51","name":"Justin Spurlock","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/s/90ced4/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":34300,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use/471131/7","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3423154,"name":"Nathan Zhou","username":"NathanZhou","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/nathanzhou/{size}/225374_2.png","created_at":"2024-09-12T20:16:43.153Z","cooked":"

No. You must STOP using that battery, put it in a sealed bag or container with baking soda and send it to your local e-waste facility.

And please wear PPE when handling that battery. Goggles, gloves, etc.

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2024-09-12T20:16:43.153Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":318,"readers_count":317,"score":78.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":471131,"topic_slug":"is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use","display_username":"Nathan Zhou","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":66330,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Fennekinü¶ä is so cute!"},"post_url":"/t/is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use/471131/8","custom_user_title":"Fennekinü¶ä is so cute!","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3423161,"name":"Christopher149","username":"Christopher149","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/838e76/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-09-12T20:26:52.142Z","cooked":"
Snake51:

dropped a battery about 5-6 feat

Out of curiosity, how did the battery get so high off the ground to drop that far?

","post_number":9,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2024-09-12T20:26:52.142Z","reply_count":2,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":298,"readers_count":297,"score":84.6,"yours":false,"topic_id":471131,"topic_slug":"is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use","display_username":"Christopher149","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":14984,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"FRC857 lead mentor / FTC10723+13284+15270 lead mentor"},"post_url":"/t/is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use/471131/9","custom_user_title":"FRC857 lead mentor / FTC10723+13284+15270 lead mentor","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3423169,"name":"EricH","username":"EricH","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/erich/{size}/128938_2.png","created_at":"2024-09-12T20:46:06.252Z","cooked":"

Someone picked it up to about head height would be my guess. As for why, remember back to your high school days and you may be able to come up with several possible reasons‚Ä¶ some of which might also make sense to your current self.

","post_number":10,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2024-09-12T20:46:06.252Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":9,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":275,"readers_count":274,"score":180.0,"yours":false,"topic_id":471131,"topic_slug":"is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use","display_username":"EricH","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":14984,"username":"Christopher149","name":"Christopher149","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/838e76/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":8}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":4212,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"#westandwithUkraine"},"post_url":"/t/is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use/471131/10","custom_user_title":"#westandwithUkraine","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":8}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":8,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3423266,"name":"neev dadhania","username":"nevadexehs","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/n/ecc23a/{size}.png","created_at":"2024-09-13T02:55:57.732Z","cooked":"

remember to only play catch with the decade old batteries on the junk shelf‚Ä¶

","post_number":11,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2024-09-13T02:55:57.732Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":10,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":232,"readers_count":231,"score":81.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":471131,"topic_slug":"is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use","display_username":"neev dadhania","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":4212,"username":"EricH","name":"EricH","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/erich/{size}/128938_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":57670,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"204 programmer + electrical"},"post_url":"/t/is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use/471131/11","custom_user_title":"204 programmer + electrical","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3423269,"name":"829 The Digital Goats Official Curmudgeon. ","username":"IndySam","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/indysam/{size}/111341_2.png","created_at":"2024-09-13T03:11:14.820Z","cooked":"

even if it‚Äôs not leaking odds are there will be broken mats or connections that will seriously decrease its usefulness.

","post_number":12,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2024-09-13T03:11:14.820Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":221,"readers_count":220,"score":44.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":471131,"topic_slug":"is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use","display_username":"829 The Digital Goats Official Curmudgeon. ","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":5305,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use/471131/12","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3423290,"name":"Skuke (aka: Payton)","username":"Skuke","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/skuke/{size}/10109_2.png","created_at":"2024-09-13T06:54:20.345Z","cooked":"

I missed the height part! Yikes!

I was the lead first aid person at an off season comp a few years ago. A battery fell off a table, ~30", and landed on a student‚Äôs foot. It was immediately swollen, discolored, and painful. I sent the student off to the hospital/urgent care with the parents to get an X-ray.

A 13 pound battery dropped on you is gonna ruin your day.

","post_number":13,"post_type":1,"posts_count":16,"updated_at":"2024-09-13T06:54:20.345Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":9,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":1,"reads":191,"readers_count":190,"score":48.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":471131,"topic_slug":"is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use","display_username":"Skuke (aka: Payton)","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":14984,"username":"Christopher149","name":"Christopher149","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/c/838e76/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":32540,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/is-my-battery-still-ok-to-use/471131/13","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":true},{"id":3423334,"name":"FrankJ","username":"FrankJ","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/frankj/{size}/5392_2.png","created_at":"2024-09-13T13:18:55.893Z","cooked":"

Don‚Äôt panic. The picture doesn‚Äôt show the crack so hard to tell how bad it is. But if it is a crack probably best to not to use it on a robot. Don‚Äôt worry about using baking soda on it. Baking soda is good for neutralizing spills, but I would not put it on a battery with a hole in it. Double bag it with plastic trash bags. Keep it upright. Maybe transport it in a plastic bucket or like. Anybody that sells car batteries will probably take it. Batteries plus and the like will take it.

Skuke:

A 13 pound battery dropped on you is gonna ruin your day.

Especially if it lands on your toe.
